item.title: On setting time aside to work on your goals
item.description:
“I’ve been meaning to do A”

- Lots of people, very often.

You’ve probably heard these words too, usually followed by "…but I just can’t find the time", or "…but I keep forgetting".

I’ve been on both sides of this phrase, and they both feel bad.

If you’re the one saying it, you probably feel frustrated. You really want to do the thing, and you really didn’t have time to do it, and it keeps happening.
